item.content:encoded:
There’s a new and high-quality mannequin of video glasses, VISION-800, which has first rate technical traits, high quality picture or video, in addition to a practical picture. On the identical time, you get an entire absence of any wires due to the wi-fi know-how. Now, let’s check out some particulars concerning the VISION-800 3D glasses.

Abstract
